{{cpp/string/char_traits/title|eq_int_type}}
{{cpp/string/char_traits/navbar}}
{{ddcl|notes={{mark constexpr since c++11}}&lt;br&gt;{{mark noexcept since c++11}}|
static bool eq_int_type( int_type c1, int_type c2 );
}}

Checks whether two values of type {{tt|int_type}} are equal.

See {{named req|CharTraits}} for the general requirements on character traits for {{tt|X::eq_int_type}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c1, c2|values to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|c1}} is equal to {{c|c2}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.

===Complexity===
Constant.
